hero.title: Well Connected Residential Houses for Rent in Sector 45 Gurugram
description: Sector 45 Gurugram is a well-established and centrally located residential locality known for its excellent connectivity and comfortable living environment. Tenants searching for a house for rent in Sector 45 Gurugram prefer this area due to its close proximity to Golf Course Road, HUDA City Centre Metro Station, and major commercial hubs. The sector offers a perfect balance between peaceful residential surroundings and quick access to workplaces, making it ideal for professionals and families alike.

Independent houses in Sector 45 offer spacious layouts, privacy, and a mature neighborhood feel. The locality is surrounded by reputed schools, hospitals, shopping complexes, local markets, and green parks, ensuring all daily needs are easily accessible. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 45 Gurugram is a smart option for tenants looking for a well-connected, safe, and long-term residential location in one of Gurugram’s most preferred sectors.

features.title: 10 Marla House for Rent in Sector 45 Gurugram

faqSection.description: Common tenant questions related to house for rent in Sector 45 Gurugram.

faqs.question: Is Sector 45 Gurugram a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 45 is a well-developed and centrally located area offering excellent connectivity and a peaceful residential environment.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 45?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are commonly available in Sector 45 Gurugram.

faqs.question: Is Sector 45 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area is family-friendly with schools, hospitals, parks, and shopping facilities nearby.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available in Sector 45?
faqs.answer: Yes, furnished, semi-furnished, and unfurnished houses are available depending on the property.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 45 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental values depend on plot size, furnishing, and exact location within the sector.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 45?
faqs.answer: Sector 45 offers excellent connectivity via HUDA City Centre Metro, Golf Course Road, and Sohna Road.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 45?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families depending on the property rules.

faqs.question: Is Sector 45 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 45 is considered a safe and well-populated residential locality.
